Sections.Text: The darkness beneath Tyree Sanitorium returns, the intruding light banished to the surface.
The Duchess Orlac luxuriates in the shadows, salving her wounded pride with the life-blood of her enemies.
The wearisome invaders did give her an idea though - that perhaps she has remained cut off from the surface world long enough.
Perhaps it is high time for the darkness to seep up above, and start snuffing out the lights of the accursed living world.
